column1: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and I'm so happy that I did. Now that I'm in the other side of 25, I've tried to find anti aging products that won't break the budget yet still work. This makes my skin so soft and smooth. 10/10 would recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've only been using it for a little over 2 weeks and my skin feels amazing. My face looks a bit more firm and lifted, but it doesn't feel tight or dry which is what I'm always afraid of with lift products. My skin feels so soft, and it feels softer instantly when you put it on! This is a product I will continue to use! I received this product complimentary for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using this product every night for the last 2 weeks, I can really see my dark skin spots getting lighter. I love how the product's non oily formula makes my sensitive skin give off a radiant yet supple glow. I can wear this alone or under my night moisturizer without any counter reactions of the products, which has been perfect to add to my night time skinroutine. . I received this product complimentary from influenster in return to give my honest feedback. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used this in addition to the L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Derm Intensives Hyaluronic Acid for about 1 month and noticed some difference in my skin. My skin felt more supple and I noticed less fine lines around my eyes. I used twice a day- once in the morning and once before bed. I received both products complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was hesitant about this product at first, but not anymore! LOREAL - 10% Pure Vitamin C Serum really does work. It's your solution for dullness, uneven skin tone, and it even helps prevent wrinkles. I have sensitive skin and this product is gentle enough for daily use. However, it is a little pricey. I recieved this product complimentary from Influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product, complimentary, to sample and give my honest review on. I was hesitant on using it because my skin can be sensitive. I did not like how oily it was and it did not work well under my make-up. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I find out I start having lines of wrinkles uder my eyes, get nervous about it. Then I got this vitamin c serum as a sample to test for, and it does work! I have been using it for a month already and I can tell my skin texture around my eyes has improvements. Although it says the impacts are starting to tell in the first week. But mine starts to tell in about 3 weeks. But for the price of this product. I would definitely recommend it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Once of my favorite parts about this serum was the warming sensation. It's a little odd at first (and they warn you on the label), but for some reason it made my skin feel great after application. I'm not sure my face looked lightyears better, but it felt fantastic. This is such a great serum for the price. I've tried a lot of expensive brands and this held it's own! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this product through Influenster to try it out, and boy am I glad I did. I recently started noticing a crease between my eyes getting deeper. Once I started to use this product, in conjunction with the Revitalift Hyaluronic Acid Serum I noticed a big difference. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm overall happy with this product I received complimentary from Influenster. This gave a nice warming sensation in the skin when applied and felt light and easy to apply. Love the price point and would reccomend for daily use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this for review and I love it but the packaging isn't my favorite. I wish it was in a squeeze tube or something. But it works well and I'd definitely buy it for myself after I finish this tube. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product in my Influenser Box and wow was I amazed with the results I saw in just one week of applying this due to my face & neck twice a day. I even experienced some semi dead skin peeling which I normally have to get a chemical peel to experience! Ingredients were very brightening, lightweight, and a little goes and long way! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am obsessed with L'Oréal Paris Derm Intensives!!! Thanks to @influenster I received these babies for #free !!! Since I've been using them my skin feels amazing and looks radiant!!! I have been using this product for about a month now and I am obsessed! It has done amazing things to my skin. As I have been noticing my skin aging, dullness, acne, lines starting to form, I have been looking for a product that boosts my skins beauty. This is it!! I have even been able to skip my foundation because of how even and bright my skin tone now is. A slight warmth when applied to my skin lets me know it is working. Buy this. You will love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product for free in exchange for my review. I love this product! It makes my skin feel smooth and healthy, but it doesn't leave behind any greasy residue! I can use it every day without any build up. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved this serum for testing purposes and I am glad I did! I have used Vitamin C serums in the past that dried flaky on my skin. This serum is light but makes my skin feel smooth and nourished. I usually use highlighter during my normal makeup routine and have cut back after using this. It has made my skin brighter and healthy looking. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this from Influenster for review purposes* - I was so excited to receive this product because my skin scars very easily after I get a break out. I've been usually this pretty much daily since I received it and my scarring has been brightening up for sure. Some vitamin c products can irritate my skin or make it burn but this doesn't. The texture is interesting and I don't like it for the day time but it's great for the evening. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product made a noticeable difference in my skin just after 1 month of use. My skin has become brighter , and dark spots have faded. I have been using this for about a month now and I love it! A little bit goes a long way. I love the slightly warm feeling that it gives your face. My wrinkles are less noticeable which is amazing! It also goes in nicely in the morning and my makeup goes over it now problem. I have been using it 2 times a day for 2 weeks and feel like I have seen improvements in my whole face overall. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is by far one of the best products I have at this moment. I was using another vitamin C serum but it was too sticky and went everywhere. This product is lightweight and gets absorbed into my skin. I put it on after washing my face and before my make up and my skin hasn't been GLOWING for weeks now. A little goes a very long way!

This product works wonderfully! It has a very velvet like smooth texture. I have been using it for about to weeks now and has brightened up my face and makes my complexion more even. But this will keep the old age around my eyes/forehead + wrinkles at bay! Thank you for my free testers! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recently received this for review from influenster. The vitamin c serum feels warm when you put it on. I've noticed that my skin is smoother and brighter. I developed dark patches during pregnancy and they have started to fade with the use of this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this! It leaves my skin amazingly soft and smooth. My husband even said something the other day about how nice my skin looks! I received this for free for testing purposes and this is my honest opinion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Disclaimer: I received this free through Influenster.

I would continue to use it and hopefully after a couple more week, I'll noticed bigger difference. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
